q: Rearrange the sequence of a typical A/B test workflow handled by a Product Data Scientist:
What does the following SQL window function calculate, which is a common task for Data Analysts reporting on growth?
c:
SELECT 
  month, 
  revenue, 
  LAG(revenue) OVER (ORDER BY month) as prev_month_rev 
FROM sales
o: The revenue from the previous month relative to the current row
The cumulative sum of revenue up to the current month
The average revenue of the current and previous month
